TitleEnglish: I am the only one who is not attacked in the world filled with zombies.
SummaryEnglish: The "zombie panic action" story takes place in a world that is suddenly flooded with zombies, and for some reason the protagonist Takemura is the only person the zombies do not attack. If this were a zombie movie, Takemura would use this ability to fight against the zombies, but instead he just acts according to his desires.
TitleJapanese: ゾンビのあふれた世界で俺だけが襲われない
SummaryJapanese: 本作は、突如としてゾンビが溢れかえった世界を舞台に、なぜか主人公の竹村だけがゾンビに襲われない“ゾンビパニックアクション”。これがゾンビ映画だったら、竹村はこの能力を使ってゾンビと戦うことになるが、むしろ自分の欲望に従って行動しているだけだ。
Aliases: Zombie no Afureta Sekai de Ore dake ga Osowarenai
